## CreateIFFOptions interface

The options for [CreateIFF](./inline-fixture-files.createiff.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface CreateIFFOptions
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [overrideRootDir?](./inline-fixture-files.createiffoptions.overriderootdir.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The path to the root directory of the fixture. If this option is passed, the value of this option is used as the root directory instead of the path generated by [DefineIFFCreatorOptions.generateRootDir()](./inline-fixture-files.defineiffcreatoroptions.generaterootdir.md) . |
